amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing funding for research on Alzheimer's disease and related dementias.

vote.text: Amendment SA 911 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 911 proposed by Senator Markey.
